property.name: Rules
property.value: Creatures can't block. Whenever you roll [chaos], draw a card for each land you control.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Vincent Proce

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creatures without flying or islandwalk can't attack. Whenever you roll [chaos], until a player planeswalks, you can't lose the game and your opponents can't win the game.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Donato Giancola

property.name: Rules
property.value: All permanents untap during each player's untap step. Whenever you roll [chaos], you may search your library forup to three basic land cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Jean-Sébastien Rossbach

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a player casts a spell, that player flips a coin. If he or she loses the flip, counter that spell. Whenever you roll [chaos], target player reveals the top card of his or her library. If it's a nonland card, you may cast it without paying its mana cost.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a player taps a land for mana, Tember City deals 1 damage to that player. Whenever you roll [chaos], each other player sacrifices a nonland permanent.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Ben Thompson

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you set this scheme in motion, the next time you set a scheme in motion, set three schemes in motion instead.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Jesper Ejsing

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I don't expect you to understand the myriad ways in which you're about to die."

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you set this scheme in motion, search your library for a planeswalker card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle your library.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Howard Lyon

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I'm calling in a favor from an old friend. Once you're all dead, I'll consider the matter settled."

property.name: Type
property.value: Ongoing Scheme

property.name: Rules
property.value: (An ongoing scheme remains face up.) At the beginning of your end step, put a doom counter on this scheme, then this scheme deals damage equal to the number of doom counters on it to the opponent with the highest life total among your opponents. If two or more players are tied for highest life total, you choose one..

property.name: Artist
property.value: Chuck Lukacs

card.name: Drench the Soil in Their Blood

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you set this scheme in motion, after this main phase, there is an additional combat phase followed by an additional main phase. Creatures you control gain vigilance until end of turn.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Val Mayerik

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Are they dead yet? No? Then my previous order stands."

property.name: Type
property.value: Ongoing Scheme

property.name: Rules
property.value: (An ongoing scheme remains face up until it's abandoned.) When you set this scheme in motion, choose an opponent. Permanents the chosen player controls don't untap during his or her untap step. When the chosen player is attacked or becomes the target of a spell or ability, abandon this scheme.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Jim Pavelec
